extension.description: DramaFever is video streaming service that offers on-demand streaming of Asian dramas, series, movies and TV shows with subtitles. Distribution rights in your country determine what part of the catalog will be available for you. For now, the videos provided by this addon are only available in SD quality with professional subtitles and the premium service is not supported.
extension.disclaimer: This is not an official addon! If the official APP is available for your platform, use it instead of this addon. All rights on content are reserved by SoftBank.
